mapper.select: SELECT O.O_LIST_DETAIL, U.U_NICKNAME, UR.UR_SEQ, UR.U_ID, UR.SI_CODE, UR.UR_REGDATE, UR.UR_STAR, UR.UR_PIC_URL, UR.UR_CONTENT, UR.O_CODE, UR.UR_OPEN, UR.UR_ANS, (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 MONTHS')::DATE AS ONEMONTH, (SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW WHERE UR_REGDATE >= (SELECT CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 MONTHS') AND SI_CODE = #{si_code }) AS AVGSTAR FROM USER_REVIEW UR JOIN USERS U ON UR.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN ORDERS O ON UR.O_CODE = O.O_CODE WHERE UR.SI_CODE = #{si_code } ORDER BY UR.UR_SEQ DESC;
